titles.title: A resolution congratulating the University of South Carolina baseball team for its gritty and record-breaking pursuit of back-to-back National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Baseball National Championships.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/30/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Commends the University of South Carolina Gamecocks for winning the 2011 National Collegiate Athletic Association College World Series.
